thread.title_full: Not relax place, so old and ruined. - Review of Ibis Paris 17 Clichy-Batignolles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Allen S
title: Not relax place, so old and ruined.
text:
The clerks can't inform the travelers to the right places. They don't know the addresses. The beds are so terrible and dangerous because mattress move! and maybe person fall down. The clerks don't ask to the travelers. It is Not relax place, already so old and ruined.
Room Tip: All the rooms are old and ruined. See more room tips
